definition: an embankment built around a space for defensive purposes, surround with a wall in order to fortify
details:
noun
- an embankment built around a space for defensive purposes
= synonyms: bulwark
- an architectural partition with a height and length greater than its thickness
- a masonry fence (as around an estate or garden)
= example: a masonry fence (as around an estate or garden)
- a layer of material that encloses space
= example: a layer of material that encloses space
- (anatomy) a layer (a lining or membrane) that encloses a structure
= example: (anatomy) a layer (a lining or membrane) that encloses a structure
= synonyms: paries
- anything that suggests a wall in structure or function or effect
= example: anything that suggests a wall in structure or function or effect
- a vertical (or almost vertical) smooth rock face (as of a cave or mountain)
- a difficult or awkward situation
= example: a difficult or awkward situation
verb
- surround with a wall in order to fortify
= synonyms: fence
